content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences, but based on reports, there were some special guest appearances and surprise moments during the "Greatest Hits Live" tour that fans were buzzing about.

One of the most talked-about moments was when Robbie Williams brought out his father, Peter Conway, to perform with him on stage. Conway played the drums during the band's performance of "Never Forget," which was a special moment for Williams that left him emotional.

Another surprise moment came during the band's performance of "Angels," one of Williams' most famous solo tracks. During the song, Williams invited a fan from the audience to sing with him on stage, making for an emotional and unforgettable moment.

Additionally, on some nights of the tour, the band also performed a tribute to George Michael, with a rendition of "Freedom! '90." The tribute included a video montage of Michael's highlights and brought an emotional touch to the performance.

Overall, these special guest appearances and surprise moments added to the excitement and energy of the "Greatest Hits Live" tour and made it a truly unique experience for the fans.
